file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3 info: contact: email: support@phoenixnap.com name: PhoenixNAP Team url: https://phoenixnap.com/ description: | The Audit Logs API lets you read audit log entries and track API calls or activities in the Bare Metal Cloud Portal.

Knowledge base articles to help you can be found here

All URLs are relative to (https://api.phoenixnap.com/audit/v1/) license: name: Apache 2.0 url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html termsOfService: https://phoenixnap.com/infrastructure-solutions/legal-it/privacy-shield-compliant-privacy-policy title: Audit Log API version: "1.0" servers: - url: https://api.phoenixnap.com/audit/v1 security: - OAuth2: - audit.read tags: - description: Event operations name: Events paths: /events: get: description: Retrieves the event logs for given time period. All date & times are in UTC. operationId: eventsGet parameters: - description: From the date and time (inclusive) to filter event log records by. example: 2021-04-27T16:24:57.123Z explode: true in: query name: from required: false schema: format: date-time type: string style: form - description: To the date and time (inclusive) to filter event log records by. example: 2021-04-29T16:24:57.123Z explode: true in: query name: to required: false schema: format: date-time type: string style: form - description: Limit the number of records returned. example: 10 explode: true in: query name: limit required: false schema: type: integer style: form - description: Ordering of the event's time. SortBy can be introduced later on. explode: true in: query name: order required: false schema: default: ASC enum: - ASC - DESC type: string style: form - description: The username that did the actions. example: johnd@phoenixnap.com explode: true in: query name: username required: false schema: type: string style: form - description: The HTTP verb corresponding to the action. explode: true in: query name: verb required: false schema: enum: - POST - PUT - PATCH - DELETE type: string style: form - description: The request uri. example: /ams/v1/clients/12345 explode: true in: query name: uri required: false schema: type: string style: form responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Event' type: array description: The list of events recorded. "206": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Event' type: array description: The truncated list of events recorded. security: - OAuth2: - audit.read summary: List event logs. tags: - Events components: schemas: Event: description: The event log. example: userInfo: accountId: 1234dfgdsf clientId: e9d335b1-3aa4-4760-9bad-2595c0449035 username: johnd@phoenixnap.com name: API.CreateServer timestamp: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00 properties: name: description: The name of the event. example: API.CreateServer type: string timestamp: description: The UTC time the event initiated. format: date-time type: string userInfo: $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserInfo' required: - timestamp - userInfo type: object Request: description: The request sent by the user / application. properties: headers: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Headers' uri: description: The request URI. example: /v1/servers/jghf757HGhjghg type: string verb: description: The HTTP request verb. enum: - POST - PUT - PATCH - DELETE example: PATCH type: string required: - headers - uri - verb type: object ApiAction: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Event' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAction_allOf' Response: description: The response returned from the API. properties: statusCode: description: The status code returned in the response sent to the API. example: 200 type: integer resourceId: description: The ID of the resource that was created. example: 5edf1c9b4215748ac543d721 type: string required: - statusCode type: object UserInfo: description: Details related to the user / application performing this request example: accountId: 1234dfgdsf clientId: e9d335b1-3aa4-4760-9bad-2595c0449035 username: johnd@phoenixnap.com properties: accountId: description: The BMC account ID example: 1234dfgdsf type: string clientId: description: The client ID of the application example: e9d335b1-3aa4-4760-9bad-2595c0449035 type: string username: description: The logged in user or owner of the client application example: johnd@phoenixnap.com type: string required: - accountId - username type: object Headers: description: The headers received as part of this request. properties: userAgent: description: The UA String example: "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML,\ \ like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.93 Safari/537.36" type: string required: - userAgent type: object ApiAction_allOf: properties: response: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response' request: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Request' required: - request - response type: object securitySchemes: OAuth2: flows: clientCredentials: scopes: audit.read: Grants read only access to audit-log-api. tokenUrl: https://auth.phoenixnap.com/auth/realms/BMC/protocol/openid-connect/token type: oauth2

Error: notImplemented: path "/events": get: security: security "OAuth2" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
